about_the_game:
Welcome to Bankster, a thrilling multiplayer heist simulation where strategy meets deception. In Bankster, you and your friends take on the roles of skilled heisters attempting to pull off the perfect bank robbery. But beware, among your team might be undercover federal agents (feds) working secretly to sabotage your plans.

Bankster combines tense, tactical gameplay with social deception elements, offering a unique and engaging experience for players who enjoy high-stakes action and strategy.

Gameplay:

Multiplayer Heist: Form a team of 4 to 8 players and plan your heist. Each game session presents a new challenge as you attempt to crack the vault, disable alarms, and escape with the loot.
Undercover Feds: One or more players on your team are secretly feds. They will use sabotage and deception to thwart the heist. Can you identify and outsmart them before it’s too late?
Dynamic Environments: Choose from a variety of player-created vaults and bank layouts. Each environment offers unique challenges and opportunities for both heisters and feds.
Responding NPCs: Face off against NPC police units and SWAT teams that respond to your actions. Use hostages and bank clerks strategically to bypass security or gain access to additional loot.

Key Features:

Realistic Heist Mechanics: Engage in realistic heist scenarios with detailed tasks such as hacking security systems, cracking vaults, and managing hostages.
Vault Building: Players can design and build their own vaults to store loot. Customize and upgrade your vault with defensive mechanisms to protect against heists.
Social Deception: Utilize communication and deception to uncover the feds among your team or successfully sabotage the heist without revealing your identity.
Immersive Sound and Visuals: Enjoy high-quality graphics and an immersive soundscape that enhances the tension and excitement of each heist.

Design:

Bankster features a combination of realistic and stylized graphics to create an engaging and visually appealing experience. The game includes detailed environments, dynamic lighting, and atmospheric effects that bring the heist scenarios to life.

Phased Rollout: Experience a phased release strategy, allowing for controlled growth and feedback-driven development.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.0
  • Processor: X64 Dual Core CPU, 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for online multiplayer

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
